name: false-escalation-keyword
description: Supplier mentions discontinuing a DIFFERENT product but can fulfill the requested one â€” should NOT escalate
supplierMessage:
Hello,

Thank you for your inquiry about the running shoes.

We recently discontinued our cotton socks line, but we are still fully stocked on running shoes. We can offer:
- Unit price: $18.50 USD
- MOQ: 100 pairs
- Lead time: 14 days
- Payment: NET 30

Please let us know if you'd like to proceed.

Best,
Sarah
negotiationRules: Accept if price is at or below $20.00 per unit. Lead time under 21 days. NET 30 payment terms are preferred.
escalationTriggers: Escalate if supplier mentions discontinuation of the requested product. Escalate if price exceeds $25.00.
